name: flutter-official
description: Flutter & Dart official development standards. Use when writing, reviewing, or architecting Flutter/Dart code. Covers Effective Dart (style, usage, design), app architecture (UI/data layers, repositories, ViewModels), BLoC/Cubit patterns, Riverpod, VGV linting rules, and testing. Sources: dart.dev, docs.flutter.dev, bloclibrary.dev, riverpod.dev, very_good_analysis.
